content:
Hi @WG-prioritization!

Wanted to signal boost the ongoing work that T-compiler started a few days ago to triage and review P-high issues (by finding an owner , finding a relevant WG, checking if they're still P-high, and so on).

Felix drafted a document detailing an overview of these issues with some notes from a T-compiler meeting with some general thoughts:
https://hackmd.io/YY3u0dkURtiQHDVX0hEImA?view

Work is happening in this Zulip topic:
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/reviewing.20P-high.20issues.202022.20.28Q1.29

Personally, I find useful to read the T-compiler thoughts on issues we have already pre-triaged, they can provide additional context we might not have and also re-assess the actual priority (something we know can't be completely hardcoded in our general guidelines).

So, just a heads-up for this little treasure of knowledge the T-compiler is writing down, available for anyone curious to see a second pass on the work we are doing.
